definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
a boneheaded teammate can do you more harm than the most formidable opponent (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 pa4 shen2 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 shou3 , jiu4 pa4 zhu1 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 you3
containing_words.word: 不怕神一样的对手，就怕猪一样的队友

definition: a boneheaded teammate can do you more harm than the most formidable opponent (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 pa4 shen2 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 shou3 , jiu4 pa4 zhu1 yi1 yang4 de5 dui4 you3
containing_words.word: 不怕神一样的对手，就怕猪一样的队友

definition: whether it's right or wrong doesn't make a lot of difference/six of one and half a dozen of the other/as broad as it is long

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的转变也是如此，和颠覆身体的生死一样。

sentences.english: Father Mabeuf was one of those persons for whom plants have souls.
sentences.chinese: 和某些人一样，马白夫公公也认为植物是有灵魂的。

sentences.english: Your condescension, as always, is much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 像往常一样，你的屈尊俯就总是让人感激。

sentences.english: This feels like the perfect place for me right now.
sentences.chinese: 这种感觉就像那个完美的地方对我一样。

sentences.english: I think the EDG probably uses a low astigmatism eyepiece design like the SE.
sentences.chinese: 我想EDG可能使用了象SE一样的低像散目镜设计。

sentences.english: A thing that we need to celebrate much more than we are doing already.
sentences.chinese: 一样值得我们进一步颂扬的东西。

sentences.english: Like Stephen, I tend to be somewhat contrary by nature.
sentences.chinese: 像斯蒂芬一样，我也是生来倾向逆向思考。

sentences.english: Emerging Asia has grown by an annual average of 8% over the past three years—as fast as before the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 过去三年来以年均8%的速度增长着，和危机前一样。

sentences.english: Gahl: The NT5E gene is like many other genes.
sentences.chinese: NT5E基因像许多其他基因一样。

sentences.english: Xiaowen looks just like all her classmates.
sentences.chinese: 小文看起来就像她所有的同学一样。

sentences.english: Some are like myself, working as a teacher, reading and writing, content with a simple life.
sentences.chinese: 有的和我一样当教书先生，读读写写满足简朴的生活。

sentences.english: And a piranha 's a fish, just like your present.
sentences.chinese: 食人鱼也是一种鱼，就像你的生日礼物一样。

sentences.english: Jam Ho is on Facebook. Join Facebook to connect with Jam Ho and others you may know.
sentences.chinese: 吴昭仪也是个平凡人，是跟你我一样的小人物。

sentences.english: Like every paradigm throughout history, at some point or another, things change.
sentences.chinese: 正如历史上所有的范例一样，世事常变，无物永驻。

sentences.english: What constitutes spanking in a family can vary widely.
sentences.chinese: 每个家庭打屁股的具体方式也很不一样。

sentences.english: A depressive disorder is not the same as a passing blue mood.
sentences.chinese: 抑郁障碍跟一晃而过的忧郁情绪还不一样。

definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
to be just like/can be compared to
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
